comments: Roberts is a really nice person, but as an instructor? Maybe not so much. He was helpful with how to conduct the experiment, but he never really went in depth on WHY the experiments were being done and what to look for while conducting them. His lab practicals were also tough, he would tell you what to study for and then change up on you.

I haven\'t taken Beau at IRSC, but I did take him in high school. He is honestly the best teacher I\'ve ever had because he knows how to make class entertaining while teaching the course to you better than anyone else can. I strongly recommend taking him, but just don\'t sit next to a fish tank because he will call you out if you look at the fish.

loved him!! he was so nice and always made the class fun and interesting. i have never been good at biology and i took his lab class and got an A! he stays late to help and answers all of your questions. hes also fun to joke around with. i would def take him again!
He is the WORST teacher i have ever had. He really is a hs teacher so dont be foold thinking he is a proffessor! he is the absolute worst!!

He makes the class very easy and cool, he does whatever he can to make you understand everything. His a joy in class and makes you enjoy it! He lets us know exactly what to study before every test! You have to really pay attention to the lab assignments and go home and study the modules! VERY EASY! TAKE HIM if you want to learn and enjoy a class!
i had him in high school GREAT TEACHER. take this man. you will not be disappointed
He makes Gen. Bio Lab easy! Any question you have, he\'ll stop what he\'s doing to help! Always in a good mood, and very clear with instructions.
